page.title: 07OLD BUILDINGS
page.content: Wingrave is a very old village which has many old buildings. One of them is the chapel it was erected in 1832 but the first grave was planted in 1634. There are 86 graves the newest grave was planted in 1984. The chapel is no longer used. One of the other old buildings is the old school it is about 100 years old and is now used as a community centre it was replaced by the new school 10 years ago. Behind the old school there is the recreation ground which has tennis courts and a bowling green. Just out side the village there is a farm. It is over 400 years old and is said to be haunted, The farm has 48 stables which are now used for kennels.
